shows.title: Brainwashing & Mind Control / Coral Castle Mysteries
shows.first_half: First Half: Harvard University science historian Rebecca Lemov will bring us her work from the course she teaches on brainwashing and mind control.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and researcher RL Poole discusses his work and research on the amazing modern megalith known as Coral Castle in Homestead, Florida.

shows.title: Overpopulation & the Future / 'Doomsday Fish'
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, journalist, and teacher Frosty Wooldridge forecasts what we can expect in the future, and argues that overpopulation in the United States will become the single greatest issue facing Americans.
shows.second_half: Second Half: C2C's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones shares her interview with Professor Misty Paig-Tran from California State University Fullerton. She'll speak about the elusive deep-sea oarfish nicknamed the 'Doomsday Fish,' for its association with Japanese folklore surrounding earthquakes and tsunamis.

shows.title: Astrology Forecast / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Financial astrologer William Stickevers will join guest host Connie Willis (info) to share his forecast on geopolitical developments, including UFOs, AI, and more in 2025. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half.
